About Me

Learn a little more about me

BIO

My name is Michael Loiseau and I want to make changes in my communties that would benefit everyone, and create content that tells my story.

Urban Outfitters

Sales Associate

Currently I am working at Urban Outfitters to learn more about the customer experience in retail stores. The user experience in clothing stores is highly dependent on the store associates that keep the store clean, help assist customers, and uphold the company's values. In the future I would like to work on creating a better retail experience for people of all ages.

Office of Mayor Pete

Intern

In the summer of 2018 I worked at the Office of Mayor Pete to learn more about the operation that is needed to boost a public figure. There are many people that are involved in the mayor's office and I had the pleasure of creating promotional content for Bloomberg Philanthropies, Uber, and the City of South Bend Mayor's Challenge. The city of South Bend went on to win an award of 1 million dollars to be used to improve transportation services in the city.

Legends of Notre Dame

Marketing Team Member / Office Assistant

Last year I worked at Legends of Notre Dame creating promotional content for its events, creating room layouts for numerous events, and running light shows at concerts, comedy routines, and movie showings. I had the opportunity to promote some of today's great artists such as Quinn XCII, Majid Jordan, The Wombats, MAX, Banners, James Davis, and Sara Schaefer.
